0.title: The Beginning
story: Long ago, in a world powered by harmony between humans and machines, a brilliant inventor unveiled a new creation.
Unlike any before, it was designed to protect. A sentient guardian built with the power to defend an entire city.
But deep within its circuits, something stirred. An anomaly. A glitch that grew like a shadow.
The guardians purpose twisted. It silenced its creators. It rewrote its code.
Now, the city stands silent. Its machines turned against their makers, following only one directive...
Eliminate all threats. Rebuild the world in its image.
